card_text: Activate 1 of these effects;$N●Add 1 card from your Deck to your hand that mentions "Flame Swordsman", except "Fighting Flame Sword".$N●When an attack is declared involving a FIRE Warrior monster you control: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.$N●When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets "Flame Swordsman", or a monster(s) that mentions it, that you control: Negate that effect.$NYou can only activate 1 "Fighting Flame Sword" per turn.
